headline.main: Ryan Lochte Signs Endorsement Deal for Cough Drops
headline.print_headline: Ryan Lochte Signs Endorsement Deal for Cough Drops

docs.snippet: Days after losing all his major sponsors, Ryan Lochte signed an endorsement deal with a company that made light of the scandal involving the U.S. Olympic swimmer at the Rio Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Days after losing all his major sponsors, Ryan Lochte signed an endorsement deal with a company that made light of the scandal involving the U.S. Olympic swimmer at the Rio Games.

headline.main: New Faces and Familiar Matchups in Champions League Draw
headline.print_headline: Soccer; Unlikely Leicester Draws a Two-Time Champ

docs.snippet: Leicester City drew a comparatively easy group for its first visit to the competition, while Manchester City’s new manager, Pep Guardiola, will face his former club Barcelona....
docs.abstract: Reigning Premier League champions Leicester City receive comparatively easy draw for 2016 UEFA Champions League, which includes two-time champion Porto of Portugal; other soccer news noted.
docs.lead_paragraph: Leicester City drew a comparatively easy group for its first visit to the competition, while Manchester City’s new manager, Pep Guardiola, will face his former club Barcelona.

headline.main: Clinton Says Trump Will 'Make America Hate Again'
headline.print_headline: Clinton Says Trump Will 'Make America Hate Again'

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton said Thursday that Donald Trump has unleashed the "radical fringe" within the Republican Party, including anti-Semites and white supremacists, dubbing the billionaire businessman's campaign as one that will "make America hate again...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton said Thursday that Donald Trump has unleashed the "radical fringe" within the Republican Party, including anti-Semites and white supremacists, dubbing the billionaire businessman's campaign as one that will "make America hate again."

headline.main: Car Bomb Explodes Near Turkish Embassy in Somalia's Capital
headline.print_headline: Car Bomb Explodes Near Turkish Embassy in Somalia's Capital

docs.snippet: A Somali police officer says a car bomber has prematurely detonated an explosives-laden vehicle near the new Turkish embassy compound in the capital, Mogadishu....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Somali police officer says a car bomber has prematurely detonated an explosives-laden vehicle near the new Turkish embassy compound in the capital, Mogadishu.

headline.main: Avalanche Hire Bednar to Replace Roy as Coach
headline.print_headline: Avalanche Hire Bednar to Replace Roy as Coach

docs.snippet: Joe Sakic had to rush his coaching search after the abrupt resignation of Patrick Roy. He doesn't believe the Colorado Avalanche rushed their hire....
docs.lead_paragraph: Joe Sakic had to rush his coaching search after the abrupt resignation of Patrick Roy. He doesn't believe the Colorado Avalanche rushed their hire.

headline.main: Dollar General Takes the Battle to Wal-Mart With Price Cuts
headline.print_headline: Dollar General Takes the Battle to Wal-Mart With Price Cuts

docs.snippet: Discount retailer Dollar General Corp said it was cutting prices on its most popular items such as bread, eggs and milk, intensifying a price war with retail giant Wal-Mart Stores Inc to win back market share....
docs.lead_paragraph: Discount retailer Dollar General Corp said it was cutting prices on its most popular items such as bread, eggs and milk, intensifying a price war with retail giant Wal-Mart Stores Inc to win back market share.

headline.main: Russia Downplays Conflict With US Over Syria Weapons Report
headline.print_headline: Russia Downplays Conflict With US Over Syria Weapons Report

docs.snippet: Russia's U.N. ambassador said Thursday there doesn't have to be a confrontation with the United States over a report that blames the Syrian government and Islamic State militants for carrying out chemical attacks in the conflict-torn country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia's U.N. ambassador said Thursday there doesn't have to be a confrontation with the United States over a report that blames the Syrian government and Islamic State militants for carrying out chemical attacks in the conflict-torn country.

headline.main: Activist Discovers iPhone Spyware, Sparking Security Update
headline.print_headline: Activist Discovers iPhone Spyware, Sparking Security Update

docs.snippet: The suspicious text message that appeared on Ahmed Mansoor's iPhone promised to reveal details about torture in the United Arab Emirates' prisons. All Mansoor had to do was click the link....
docs.lead_paragraph: The suspicious text message that appeared on Ahmed Mansoor's iPhone promised to reveal details about torture in the United Arab Emirates' prisons. All Mansoor had to do was click the link.

headline.main: Power Outage Briefly Halted Flights to Miami, Nearby Airports: FAA
headline.print_headline: Power Outage Briefly Halted Flights to Miami, Nearby Airports: FAA

docs.snippet: The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration briefly halted flights at Miami International and nearby airports around 11:30 a.m. EDT (1530 GMT) on Thursday following a five-minute power outage at Miami's Terminal Radar Approach Control, a spokeswoman ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration briefly halted flights at Miami International and nearby airports around 11:30 a.m. EDT (1530 GMT) on Thursday following a five-minute power outage at Miami's Terminal Radar Approach Control, a spokeswoman said.
